dmca.title: Urgent: DMCA
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Admin [mailto:admin@pimpsurveys.com] 
Sent: Sunday, April 08, 2007 6:28 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Urgent: DMCA

4/08/2007

Dear Andrea Z. Almeida,

It has been brought to our attention that http://www.profileriot.com is 
displaying copyrighted materials on your servers.

I have a good faith belief, and in fact know for certain, that use of 
the copyrighted materials described below on the infringing web pages 
was not authorized by my registered copyright and by the law.

I hereby demand that you act expeditiously to remove or disable access 
to the material or items claimed to be infringing.

Infringing items or materials:
1.  http://www.profileriot.com/surveys/17
2.  http://www.profileriot.com/surveys/9
3.  http://www.profileriot.com/surveys/7
4.  http://www.profileriot.com/surveys/5

Location of original works:
1.  http://www.pimpsurveys.com/view-survey.php?id=1543
2.  http://www.pimpsurveys.com/view-survey.php?id=2076
3.  http://www.pimpsurveys.com/view-survey.php?id=67
4.  http://www.pimpsurveys.com/view-survey.php?id=39

You have now been placed on notice of this infringement and, based on 
the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, you are entitled to suspend the 
display of such infringing material. If you fail to suspend the 
infringing material, you will also be considered as an infringer of the 
copyrights in the material.

I, Maxwell Stoller, certify under penalty of perjury, that the 
information in this notification is accurate and that I am the exclusive

owner of the copyrights that are being infringed and that I am 
authorized to act on behalf of the owner.

My contact information is as follows:
Maxwell Stoller
557 East Shore Road
Kings Point, New York 11024
516-398-2213


Sincerely,




Maxwell Stoller
